18#include "tools.h"
19#include "metadata.h"
20
21static int vgck_single(struct cmd_context *cmd __attribute((unused)),
22 const char *vg_name,
23 struct volume_group *vg,
24 void *handle __attribute((unused)))
25{
26 if (!vg_check_status(vg, EXPORTED_VG)) {
27 stack;
28 return ECMD_FAILED;
29 }
30
31 if (!vg_validate(vg)) {
32 stack;
33 return ECMD_FAILED;
34 }
35
36 return ECMD_PROCESSED;
37}
38
39int vgck(struct cmd_context *cmd, int argc, char **argv)
40{
41 return process_each_vg(cmd, argc, argv, 0, NULL,
42 &vgck_single);
43}
44
